title: European Train & Tram Sound Effects Collection
description: A wide variety of 100 sound effects of different types of trains and trams found across Europe.
longDescription:
All aboard!


This pack features a wide variety of 100 high-quality sound effects from different types of trains and trams found across Europe.


Here you can find powerful and heavy cargo train passbys, the smooth ride of a modern train, metro interiors, tram exteriors and clunky sounds of an old diesel train engine.


The carefully captured sounds amount to over 40 minutes of recordings from around Belgium, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Czechia, Ireland, Italy, Poland, Serbia, Slovakia, Spain and Switzerland.


You can also hear unique and authentic sounds like short passenger train passbys, train cab compartment perspectives and small cable car interiors. Aside from full sequences youâ€™ll also find looped sound effects that are perfect for creating continuous background audio!
